name: Darksire Amulet
url: pfsrd://Advanced Race Guide/Races/Tieflings/New Racial Rules/Tiefling Magic Items/Darksire Amulet

Construction.Requirements: Craft Wondrous Item, resist energy, creator must be a tiefling, half-fiend, or true fiend

sections.body: This small iron locket contains some token—a scale, a shaving of a horn or claw, or lock of burning hair—from a fiend. When worn by a tiefling, if he has cold, electricity, or fire resistance, this amulet increases that resistance by 5. Furthermore, it provides a +4 insight bonus on Diplomacy skill checks made to influence evil outsiders.
